name: Jewel Tap Blitz
description:
Jewel Tap Blitz! – Glitter, Cool Colorful Jewels pop-up on your mobile phone and tablet. Tap That Jewel! in this amazing fun, extremely addictive and keeps you coming back again and again. This is the funnest jewel game and it is at your finger tips.

Collect these cute colourful juicy jelly characters. There are 3 games to choose from. Easy if you want to play it safe, Advanced when you are looking for a great challenge or play the Timer version against the clock. But watch out for the scary goo. See the Queen Jewels, click on her like crazy to earn bonus tap points.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Jewel Tap Blitz!!
